attributes.action: Cease the practice of adding flouride to drinking water
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a costly and unwarranted process. 

The benfits of adding flouride to drinking water have been made far from clear, whilst people have been writing for years about potentially harmful effects.

We urge the government to either cease this practice in it's entierety, or publish a convincing argument to justify the continuation of this practice.
